about_the_game:
POWER LINE RIDER



Embark on an action-packed journey in Power Line Rider, diving players into an all new hand-pixeled world. Assume the role of John Glider, veteran member of the Power Line Rider organization. Venture out to Reestablish contact with 3 bases that have recently gone dark in this post-apocalyptic world where the fastest means of travel is riding on old power lines.

STORY MODE / ENDLESS MODE



Beat the 3 Bosses in the concise "Story Mode" to unlock the thrilling and addictive "Endless Mode". Enter the NegaZone and ride through ever increasing difficulty all the way to Infinity! (Or as long as you can survive!)

KEY FEATURES



  • For All Ages: With 3 difficulty settings, Easy, Normal, and Hard, Power Line Rider caters to all ages and skill levels!
  • Charming Pixel Art Graphics: Immerse yourself in a 2D retro pixel art world reminiscent of classic 8-bit games. Bask in the nostalgia!
  • Procedurally Placed Enemies: All enemies are placed procedurally, so every play through is different!
  • Energetic Soundtrack: Enjoy original Chiptune melodies, full of energy, paying homage to the 8-bit console era!

DEMO CONTENT


Play through the 1st Region "Bird Forest" in the Demo! The full game will feature 3 Regions and an Endless Mode!

name: Power Line Rider Demo
short_description: Free Demo for Power Line Rider! Power Line Rider is an Action-Packed Arcade Game with a retro 8-bit aesthetic! Dodge Birds, Squirrels, Monkeys and Fight Bosses as you race across a post-apocalyptic world where the fastest means of travel is riding on old Power Lines!
